cause.description:
Electric river are a well established rock band situated in kent. with a great turnout at all thier gigs and even two sell out performances at ukc's gulbenin theatre it is hard to imagine as to why this group have not yet been sighned. recently playing on the main stage at kents lounge on the farm they where playing along side headliners super furry animals. check them out at www.electricriver.net for latest news and up and coming events and also download thier latest and greatest music at www.myspace.com/electricriver
1. record contact required
2. groupies lent out for all ocasions
cause.name: Electric river
